subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Andruw Jones and Jeff Francoeur homered on consecutive pitches in the sixth inning last night to help the Atlanta Braves end their longest streak without a home run in 24 years, and Manager Bobby Cox tied Sparky Anderson for fourth place in career victories with a 4-1 victory against the Pittsburgh Pirates.
